mapper.select: SELECT DbT7055GappeiJoho."chiikiNo" as "chiikiNo" ,DbT7055GappeiJoho."gappeiShurui" as "gappeiShurui" ,DbT7055GappeiJoho."gappeiYMD" as "gappeiYMD" ,DbT7055GappeiJoho."shichosonCode" as "shichosonCode" ,DbT7055GappeiJoho."hokenshaNo" as "hokenshaNo" ,DbT7055GappeiJoho."kyuJohoFuyoToYMD" as "kyuJohoFuyoToYMD" ,DbT7055GappeiJoho."kokuhorenDataFromYMD" as "kokuhorenDataFromYMD" FROM rgdb."DbT7055GappeiJoho" DbT7055GappeiJoho WHERE DbT7055GappeiJoho."kokuhorenDataFromYMD" = (SELECT DbT7055GappeiJoho."kokuhorenDataFromYMD" FROM rgdb."DbT7055GappeiJoho" DbT7055GappeiJoho WHERE DbT7055GappeiJoho."chiikiNo"=(SELECT MAX(DbT7055GappeiJoho."chiikiNo") FROM rgdb."DbT7055GappeiJoho" DbT7055GappeiJoho)) AND left(DbT7055GappeiJoho."kokuhorenDataFromYMD", 6) <= #{基準年月}

SELECT DbT7056GappeiShichoson."kyuShichosonCode" as "kyuShichosonCode" ,DbT7056GappeiShichoson."kyuHokenshaNo" as "kyuHokenshaNo" ,DbT7056GappeiShichoson."kyuShichosonMeisho" as "kyuShichosonMeisho" ,DbT7056GappeiShichoson."todofukenMeisho" as "todofukenMeisho" ,DbT7056GappeiShichoson."gunMeisho" as "gunMeisho" ,DbT7056GappeiShichoson."yubinNo" as "yubinNo" ,DbT7056GappeiShichoson."telNo" as "telNo" ,DbT7056GappeiShichoson."rojinhokenShichosonNo" as "rojinhokenShichosonNo" ,DbT7056GappeiShichoson."rokenJukyushaNoTaikei" as "rokenJukyushaNoTaikei" ,DbT7056GappeiShichoson."hyojiUmu" as "hyojiUmu" ,DbT7056GappeiShichoson."unyoKaishiYMD" as "unyoKaishiYMD" ,DbT7056GappeiShichoson."unyoShuryoYMD" as "unyoShuryoYMD" ,DbT7055GappeiJoho."chiikiNo" as "chiikiNo" ,DbT7055GappeiJoho."gappeiShurui" as "gappeiShurui" ,DbT7055GappeiJoho."gappeiYMD" as "gappeiYMD" ,DbT7055GappeiJoho."shichosonCode" as "shichosonCode" ,DbT7055GappeiJoho."hokenshaNo" as "hokenshaNo" ,DbT7055GappeiJoho."kyuJohoFuyoToYMD" as "kyuJohoFuyoToYMD" ,DbT7055GappeiJoho."kokuhorenDataFromYMD" as "kokuhorenDataFromYMD" FROM rgdb."DbT7055GappeiJoho" DbT7055GappeiJoho INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT7056GappeiShichoson" DbT7056GappeiShichoson ON DbT7055GappeiJoho."gappeiYMD" = DbT7056GappeiShichoson."gappeiYMD" AND DbT7055GappeiJoho."chiikiNo" = DbT7056GappeiShichoson."chiikiNo" WHERE left(DbT7056GappeiShichoson."unyoKaishiYMD", 6) <= #{基準年月} AND #{基準年月} <= left(DbT7056GappeiShichoson."unyoShuryoYMD", 6) ORDER BY DbT7055GappeiJoho."gappeiYMD" asc ,DbT7055GappeiJoho."chiikiNo" asc

rgdb."DbT7055GappeiJoho" DbT7055GappeiJoho INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT7051KoseiShichosonMaster" DbT7051KoseiShichosonMaster ON DbT7055GappeiJoho."chiikiNo" = DbT7051KoseiShichosonMaster."gappeiChiikiNo"
